Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Snow inland this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain except wet snow inland overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers except wet snow inland early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
